Combine the Domain and Supplemental Qualifier

Source: R/supp.R
combine_supp.Rd

Combine the Domain and Supplemental Qualifier

Usage

combine_supp(dataset, supp)

Arguments

dataset

Domain dataset

supp

Supplemental Qualifier dataset

Value

a dataset with the supp variables added to it

Examples

library(safetyData)
library(tibble)
combine_supp(sdtm_ae, sdtm_suppae)  %>% as_tibble()
#> # A tibble: 1,191 × 36
